title: AMD Ryzen 7 5800X3D price and release date announced alongside six new CPUs
content:
AMD announced the Ryzen 7 5800X3D CPU back in January while teasing the Ryzen 7000 desktop processors. This new Ryzen 7 5800X3D processor builds upon the existing octa-core Ryzen 7 5800X CPU to offer more performance with AMD’s 3D V-Cache memory. AMD has now confirmed the release date and pricing for this particular CPU along

The post AMD Ryzen 7 5800X3D price and release date announced alongside six new CPUs appeared first on xda-developers.
description: In this article, we're going to take a quick look at the price, release date, and specifications of the Ryzen 7 5800X3D processor.
